title: Updated 2 Bed 2 Bath in Pawtucket, utilities included

Good-sized bedroom closets, pantry, and storage closets

Move-in requirements: 1 year lease, first month's rent, and security deposit equal to one month of rent.

title: Cumberland/ Valley Falls Brand-New Two Bed Rental
description: Ready for immediate occupancy! Includes wide-open floor plan with fresh paint, spotless hardwoods and over 800 sq. feet of immaculate living space Great natural lighting with brand-new everything throughout.  house also has brand new warm vinyl windows and insulation Fully updated kitchen with all granite and new appliances, including dishwasher and hood microwave Bright and sunny family room with all hardwoods, easily large enough to make one side a dining area Spotless bath with stand up shower and all brand new fixtures, vanity and toilet Spacious beds, also with hardwoods and ample closet space Dedicated laundry for just 1st floor Private front and side entrances Off street parking including one garage spot Shared fenced yard Great Cumberland location, between RT 114 and 123, just minutes to 95 and less than a ten minute drive to South Attleboro Commuter Rail.

title: Grande Apartamento 3 habitaciones Tercer Piso Central Falls, RI
description: We are renting (3) THREE bedroom apartment 3rd floor unfurnished and rent does not include utilities (electricity and gas). The apartment has a bathroom, kitchen and living room. You will have parking for 1 vehicle. This apartment would be perfect for a single person or couple. The apartment is near the bus line, shops, laundry, and restaurants. We are seeking a Non-Smoker, drug-free, responsible person that pays the rent on time, clean with good hygiene, quiet, respectful individual(s) with no bad habits of any kind. The first month of rent $975 and security deposit $975 is due before moving (No exceptions). If you want to see the apartment send me a text for an appointment.
Please be ready to answer the following and be ready to provide the documentation when we meet.
Question # 2: What is You Move-In Date?
Question # 3: What Is Your Monthly Income?

title: Central Falls – Just Rehabbed Two Bed - $800
description: Central Falls – Just Rehabbed Two Bed - $850
This 2nd floor two-bed unit was just updated and has almost 800 sq. feet of immaculate living space
• Includes fresh paint, new flooring and many updates throughout
• Large, eat-in kitchen with newer cabinets, just-installed vinyl flooring and gas cooking
• Comfortable gas space heater with warm vinyl windows throughout
• Spotless bath with stand-up shower, new vanity/sink and new laminate flooring
• Spacious beds also both with new laminate flooring and ample closet space
• Convenient Central Falls location, minutes to 95, walking distance to bus route and laundromat and only ¼ mile to High School

title: 1st Floor Sunny 1BR Apt. with Off-Street Parking
description: Central Falls historic district near Pawtucket line, sunny, spacious 1000 sq.ft. 1 bedroom apartment in converted 1885 Parish Hall, high ceilings, wood floors, freshly painted, dishwasher, coin-op washer & dryer in common area.  Large glass block windows provide the finished basement with plenty of natural light. Pleasant yard enclosed by Canadian hemlock hedge provides privacy from street and peaceful atmosphere.  Lawn has automatic sprinkler system and is maintained by landscaping service. Off street parking, non-smokers, no pets, $800.00, utilities not included.
First floor:  Large open kitchen/dining/living room; bedroom; closet; bathroom; spiral staircase leading to basement
Basement: one large room with natural light; one storage room with utility sink
10 minute drive to downtown Providence.  50 minute drive to downtown Boston. 3 minute drive to new Pawtucket/Central Falls train station and bus hub (under construction).
Please send an email and let me know a little bit about yourself (for instance: where you work, why you're moving, who will be living with you..etc.) and I'll get back to you to make an appointment.
